Articles.Content: On this thread I'll list all my YouTube videos with a link and a short description, as I upload them, for convenience. Please feel free to comment with your opinions or advice. - **[KSP - Flight to the Old Airfield](https://youtu.be/y3r3_v0u0BE)** in the Aeris 3A. Mainly to test the recording software. - KSP 0.7.3 - How Hard Can It Be? - I just about beat [Scott Manley's attempt](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Qj_pzO9HqM) at [thread=116148]this challenge.[/thread] - **[KSP - The Smallest Biplane](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NM1mp6hsyQ8)** - How small can you build a flyable biplane? - [**Nitronic Rush - DeLorean Enters the Matrix**](https://youtu.be/v6cWHCo61WU) - Exactly what it says on the tin: I drive a DeLorean in the Matrix. - [**KSP - A History of the Space Centre**](https://youtu.be/i-r2mdGEdM0) - How has the KSC changed during KSP's development? - [**Skyrim - Top 3 Dwemer Secrets**](https://youtu.be/JZZUpLuS_UQ) - My Top 3 favourite Dwemer (Dwarven) secrets in Skyrim. - [**KSP - History of the Easter Eggs**](https://youtu.be/5nd17vJNbN0) - All the Easter Eggs in the game's history, even the Magic Boulder. - [**KSP - Who Uses Stock Ships Anyway?**](https://youtu.be/ztL0cEkwDt0) - I show why most of the stock ships are actually quite useful. - [**Nitronic Rush - Story Mode in a Single Take**](https://youtu.be/l6jKHFhyci0) - I play though story mode in Nitronic Rush. No reshoots. No edits. **Series** > > > > Doctor Who - The Adventure Games - A playthrough of each game, edited into something resembling the TV series. > > > > Spoiler > > > A short series in which I play all the episodes of Doctor Who: The Adventure Games. I have edited the footage to remove menus, mini-games and loading screens, to make the video look as much like a TV episode as possible. > > > 1. **[Doctor Who - City of the Daleks](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F6G5d6tU7Xk)** - The TARDIS materializes in 1963 to find the human race crushed by the Daleks. The Doctor embarks on a quest to the Dalek planet to correct time and save the last survivor of Humanity - Amy Pond! > 2. [**Doctor Who - Blood of the Cybermen**](https://youtu.be/H6z62qH3KMA) - The TARDIS materializes in the Arctic, where members of a survey team are turning from flesh to metal and digging something sinister from under the ice that's been waiting thousands of years - an army of Cybermen! > 3. [**Doctor Who - TARDIS**](https://youtu.be/qYSYw5ty_Q4) - With the TARDIS caught in a time riptide, it's up to Amy to save the day or leave the Doctor trapped in the void forever. Meanwhile, a dangerous entity is roaming the TARDIS corridors and it hasn't been fed for a very long time... > 4. [**Doctor Who - Shadows of the Vashta Nerada**](https://youtu.be/bfpxbxB11Ic) - The Doctor and Amy discover an underwater base that's been attacked by a sea monster from another world, but its crew are living in fear of something else - a voracious horror that hides in the shadows: the Vashta Nerada. > 5. [**Doctor Who - The Gunpowder Plot**](https://youtu.be/HO95-3OrUhI) - The TARDIS lands in London, 1605, encountering a group of men who are plotting to assassinate the King. The Doctor, Amy and Rory realise they are at a pivotal point in time but so are two alien races, both of which are more than happy to change history to suit their own ends... > > > > Complete Playlist > > > > > > > > > > **Behind the Scenes** **KSP Mods:** Spoiler [**Asteroid Day**](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232196-asteroid-day) by Squad - Not used in any videos Transmute Dragon Soul - Since *Top 3 Ancient Nord Ruins* Auto Unequip Ammo - Not used in any videos PWC - Exit on Demand - Not used in any videos **My PC Specs:** Spoiler Toshiba Satellite C50-A-157 OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit CPU: Intel i3-3110M @ 2.4 GHz GPU: Intel HD Graphics 4000 RAM: 4GB Screen Resolution: 1366x768 > > > > > > [![gADjeMpl.png](http://i.imgur.com/gADjeMpl.png)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyiBxMCggF56hmPxQkLLcqA) **Edited December 2, 2015 by TheMoonRover** Attempting to fix formatting part 5

Here is my latest video, in which I attempt to fly a minauture biplane down the runway at KSC.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NM1mp6hsyQ8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T00:53:38Z" title="06/14/2015 12:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by TheMoonRover**
  
Fixed Youtube embed

I'm back! I've been on holiday in Scotland, then I bought Skyrim and got a little carried away. Anyway, here is my new video, in which I show how Kerbal Space Centre has changed during KSP's development process, from the first public alpha version to the 1.0 release, then demonstrate how much longer it takes to climb the Vehicle Assembly Building than it does to get down again.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/i-r2mdGEdM0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T03:37:16Z" title="07/20/2015 03:37  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by TheMoonRover**

In this video I showcase every easter egg in the game, plus a few which have gone missing in recent versions. There're also a few glitches along the way. It took me considerably longer to make this video than I thought it would, for various reasons. Well, the magic boulder was always very elusive. Thanks to Brotoro for helping me to finally track it down. Remember: do not taunt the magic boulder. I also make videos for other games. Check out my first Skyrim video. **Edited December 2, 2015 by TheMoonRover** New forum, New formatting

In which I take a look at all the stock ships, showing off what they can do and why they can in fact be useful. With plenty of outtakes to go around. I've made a series called Doctor Who - The Adventure Games, in which I play all fives episodes of The Adventure Games. I've edited the videos to cut out menus and mini-games, trying to get as close to a TV epsisode as possible. **Edited December 2, 2015 by TheMoonRover** New forum, New formatting
